Officiator
Chateau Bromont
Hotel
90, rue de Stanstead, Bromont, Québec J2L 1K6
(450) 534-3433
Château Bromont is located approximately 20 minutes from the venue. Rooms can be reserved for ~240$/night.
A free shuttle service from the venue to the hotel will be provided. The shuttle will arrive at the venue at midnight to transport any guests staying at Chateau Bromont.
FAQ

If you have any additional questions, send us an email at info@kmgetmarried.com
What’s the dress code?
The dress code for our wedding semi-formal attire. Wear something you’re comfortable in- button-up shirts, long flowy dresses, or whatever brings you joy. Since our ceremony will take place outside, we don’t recommend stiletto heels due to grass and gravel.
Are kids also invited?
While we love your little ones, our wedding is going to be an adults-only event. We appreciate you making arrangements ahead of time so that you can celebrate with us.
Will the ceremony and reception be indoors or outdoors?
The ceremony is planned to be outdoors with no cover. In the event of rain, the ceremony will take place inside the barn. The reception will take place at the same location indoors as well.
Do you have a gift registry?
Your love, laughter, and company on our big day is the greatest gift of all, however, should you wish to help us celebrate with a gift, we will have a honeymoon wishing well available on the day.

We’re incredibly thankful to have everything we already need and would love for you to help us create some new experiences and lifelong memories!
Will there be on-site parking available?
Free parking is available on-site.
What time should I arrive?
We recommend that you arrive an hour before the start of the ceremony, to make sure everyone is on time, and we can get the party started as scheduled!
Can I bring a plus one?
Unfortunately, due to venue restrictions, we are unable to accommodate plus ones. We will only be able to accommodate those listed on your invitation. We appreciate your understanding!
Will accommodations be available?
If you can, we recommend staying at Chateau Bromont. We were unable to reserve a block- so book early if you know you can make it and want to stay here!
Is there any transportation available?
Yes, we have arranged for a shuttle service at the end of the night to transport guests from the venue to the hotel, Chateau Bromont. The shuttle will arrive at the venue at midnight to pick up guests.

If you require any assistance in getting home, we recommend Taxi Granby (450-372-3000) or carpooling.
Can I take pictures at the ceremony?
We invite you to be fully present with us during our ceremony, so please turn off all phones and cameras until the ceremony conclusion.
We can’t wait to
celebrate with you!
- Mariah and Knealand
